item.description:
Come celebrate the 1/2-way mark of the best holiday of the year and have a chance to win a pair of VIP tickets to U2!

Tenon Tours has teamed up with the HARP and Budweiser to bring you the Second biggest party of the year (and a close second at that!). Join 200 of you closest friends as we celebrate St. Paddy’s Day only Being only 182 days away!

When: Friday, September 18th
Where: The Harp, 85 Causeway Street, Boston, MA 02114 (across from the TD Garden)

Event Times:
7:00pm – 9:30pm: Doors open, Exclusive VIP Pre-Party
9:30pm – 1:30am: Entire Harp Opens – 2 Levels of Entertainment

Includes:

* Cover charge included
* Free appetizers between 7-9:30
* One free beer
* Traditional Irish Music by Curragh’s Fancy (7-9pm downstairs)
* Live Performance by The Joshua Tree, Boston’s own U2 Tribute Band (10pm-1am upstairs)
* DJ Vince 1 spinning the best mash-ups, house, and pop (10pm-1am downstairs)
* A chance to win a VIP package to U2, complete with a pair of tickets and limo service
* A chance to win other great prizes including a Free Flight to Ireland

The Scoop: There will only be 200 admitted to the exclusive Tenon Tours Pre-Party. Boston’s very own Curragh’s Fancy will be playing your favorite Irish drinking songs while you enjoy free St. Patty’s Day appetizers and a complimentary cocktail. At 9:30 pm there will be a drawing for a 2 free Flights to Ireland. There will also be prizes for Best Dressed!
At 9:30, The upstairs will open and Boston’s Premiere U2 Tribute Band, Joshua Tree, will go on stage. The downstairs will remain open where DJ Vince1 will be spinning be spinning the perfect mix of Hip-Hop, Top 40, Mash-ups, and 80s.
Around Midnight, there will be a drawing for 2 sets of tickets to see U2 Perform at Gillette Stadium, complete with Limo Service!

Price: $30.00 (limited quantities available)

Click to Pay Now
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be downstairs hosting the VIP Pre-Party from 7-9pm
item.name: Halfway to St. Paddy's Day Party
